author: casparschwa
content: Sharing the [Robust Incentives Group's](https://rig.ethereum.org/) view on EIP prioritization for Glamsterdam: https://notes.ethereum.org/@css/rig-glamsterdam. RIG has (co-)authored many EIPs proposed for Glamsterdam, and so we took inspiration from how client teams take a position on Glamsterdam. Note that we only take a view on EIPs we can offer domain expertise in (all CL EIPs + *Repricings* & sparse blobpool EIP on EL) ðŸ™‚
